thread.title: Bulletin Board for Oct. 9
thread.title_full: Bulletin Board for Oct. 9 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Bulletin Board for Oct. 9
text:
Bennett High School’s 13th annual Hall of Fame dinner will be 4 p.m. Oct. 17 in the school’s auditorium. Inductees are Steve Brucato (‘84), Ed Finnerty (‘62), Ed Johnson (‘73), Sam Milaro (‘61) and Jennifer Smith Zakrzewski (‘85), Jeff Smith (‘80) will receive the Career Achievment Award and David Jay (‘57) will be presented with the Earle Y. Hannel Memorial Award. All Bennett alumni and friends are invited. Tickets are $20 and available at the Main Street front door. Contact kenwparr@roadrunner.com .
Iroquois will hold its Athletic Wall of Fame Induction 5 p.m. Oct. 16 in the Iroquois Middle School auditorium. Scott Slade Sr. (‘78), Debbie Coatsworth (‘81) and Vincent Frisicaro will be horoned.
BASKETBALL: St. Joe’s High School will hold clinics for boys in grades 6-8 on Monday (9 a.m.-4 p.m.), Oct. 24 and Oct. 25 from 1 to 4 p.m. in the St. Joe’s gym. Varsity head coach Mark Simon and his assistants will run the clinic. Cost is $50 for the first session, which includes lunch and $25 for the others. A special bundle discount for all three is $75. Call 874-2224 or pschneider@sjci.com for details. ... Basketball referees needed for the upcoming season. Contact George at 629-8522 or umpiregm@hotmail.com .
HOCKEY: The Dunkin’ Donuts Learn to Skate and Play classes for boys and girls ages 4-12 will start Nov. 2 at Leisure Rinks in Orchard Park and Nov. 6 at Holiday Twin Rinks in Cheektowaga. There are seven sessions, once a week programs to teach fundamentals. Cost is $70. Skates and helmets will be provided at no charge if necessary. No previous experience is required and participants receive a jersey. Call 685-3660 or visit www.holidayrinks.com .
The Bulletin Board appears Tuesday and Friday. Information must be submitted by mail (c/o Buffalo News, Sports Dept., One News Plaza, Buffalo, NY 14240) or email ( sports@buffnews.com ). There is no charge.
